Translations.Text: Say ja nie have power benefit harm Len co GOD wills happens mna. Ja zauzlit buduci ja zvacsit moj wealth ziaden harm afflicted mna! Ja je ziaden inak than warner bearer z dobry zvest those verit

He created ona z 1 clovek (Adam). Subsequently He dat kazdy clovek mate zalozit tranquility ju! Ona potom beriem lahky load ze ona ledva zbadat. mat rad load gets heavier they implore GOD ich Lord Ona dat us dobry baby my bol appreciative
when He dat them dobry baby they turn Jeho darcekove predmety into idol rivals Him. GOD exalted DALEKO any partnership

they robit noha on kto they have chodza? robi they hands kto they have chranit? robi they oci kto they have see robi they ears kto they have hear Say Vola sa tvoj idols ziadat them smite mna without oneskorenie
